title: DATE NIGHT: a short story prequel to LOVED THE RIGHT WAY
description: This is an erotic short story about a loving wife and mother Adrianna, who looks forward all week to date night with her husband. This particular date night was one for the record books, the best she has ever had. Then two days later the husband that she loved and adored so much dropped a bomb shell on the relationship that she thought was so perfect.
author: M.D.  Smith
